vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ὁμοί-ωμα, ατος, τό,
likeness, image, [Refs 5th c.BC+]; ἐξ ὁμοιώματος in accordance with the practice in similar cases, by analogy, [Refs 1st c.AD+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: likeness; looking like, image; form, appearance
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
likeness; looking like, image; form, appearance
primarily that which is conformed or assimilated; form, shape, figure, Rev. 9:7; likeness, resemblance, similitude, Rom. 1:23; 5:14; 6:5; 8:3; Phil. 2:7*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: semejanza; apariencia (APOC.9:7) ; algo hecho para que se parezca, imágen (ROM.1:23) ; nacer como hombre (FIL.2:7)
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 相似
2) 形像,樣式
2a)形像,仿傚的東西 (羅 1:23)
2b)樣式,外貌 (啟 9:7)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 相似
2) 形像,样式
2a)形像,仿效的东西 (罗 1:23)
2b)样式,外貌 (启 9:7)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: thứ giống như; tương tự, giống
